original_title: Stina Nordenstam – An Introduction to Her New Album "And She Closed Her Eyes"
overview: This specially commissioned programme includes conversation and songs from Stina Nordenstam's album "And She Closed Her Eyes," plus the video for her single "Little Star" directed by the award-winning Michel Gondry.
title: Stina Nordenstam – An Introduction to Her New Album "And She Closed Her Eyes"
